paper_abstract: In this paper, the authors present a frequency domain coupled model making use of the Finite Element Method (FEM) and of the Method of Fundamental Solutions (MFS) in order to address soil-structure interaction problems. In this model, the MFS is used to account for the presence of an infinite soil surrounding an elastic structure, which is modeled using the FEM. Application examples concerning the vibration introduced in an infinite soil by a dynamic load acting within a tunnel are presented, in order to illustrate the usefulness and practical applicability of the method. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A coupled MFS-FEM model for 2-D dynamic soil-structure interaction in the frequency domain
